Plot: The Deal is a psychological thriller about unexpected change. The fat girl's skinny. The stoner's a success. And the nerd who did magic tricks is now the life of the party. But for Bryce, ...
Title: The Deal
Writer: Daniel S. Kaminsky, Will Strouse (based on the screenplay by)
Actors: Jake Weary, Alexandra Shipp, Daniel Amerman, Michelle DeFraites
